subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. is reviewing an incident in which Mark Cuban, the Dallas Mavericks' owner, went to the aid of the wife of the Mavericks coach when she got in to a dispute with a pair of Suns fans.
snippet: The N.B.A. is reviewing an incident in which Mark Cuban, the Dallas Mavericks' owner, went to the aid of the wife of the Mavericks coach when she got in to a dispute with a pair of Suns fans.
